Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: For lease office space available on the second and third floors of Bishops Corner West, a premiere 257,216 SF office and retail complex prominently located at 345 North Main Street in West Hartford, CT. The property is situated at the crossroads of North Main Street and Route 44 (Albany Avenue) and is within a 10-minute drive to downtown Hartford and a 5-minute drive to Blue Back Square. Just minutes to I-84 and I-91, it is also centrally located midway between Boston and New York City. Bishops Corner West also boasts over $21M in improvements, with new common areas, elevators and parking lot.
